name: Pre-Assembly: Atoms, Institutions, Blockchains
description: The talk will introduce a framework to compare and contrast the different systems humans use to create certainty and trust in our affairs: atoms, institutions, and now blockchains. This helps us more squarely answer the root question: what are blockchains for?

speakers.name: Josh Stark
speakers.bio: Josh works for Ethereum at the Ethereum Foundation, where he serves as part of the leadership team. Previously, he co-founded ETHGlobal and L4.
